name: Super Shiny Leader Of Pain
description:
You are the super shiny leader of pain! Hated amongst many because you ravish the lands and take what you want. As the leader of pain, you get attacked most of the time where ever you are. You have been able to harness the powerful energy of pain and are able to shoot magic pain balls at your foes. Your enemies come from 4 different elements, earth, fire, water and air. You must draw the shapes of the magic pain runes to destroy your enemies.

The enemy will spawn with the runes above there head for only the first time you see them, after that you are on your own to combat them.

Game is for Android Only.
